Name: Spellwake
About the game: Spellwake is an online 3D Action RPG. In this game, the world has been invaded by an overpowering planar force. You play as a renegade who takes up arms and decides to kill as many invaders as possible. Features: Fast-paced hack n' slash against hordes of monsters and powerful bosses. An vast class system with few restrictions. You can combine any classes to make creative and original builds. Anything Goes. We want all builds to be viable and fun. Full multiplayer. No account creation. Just start the game and play with your friends. Free to play. Nothing is locked. An open world to explore. No areas are restricted. Scripted raid bosses. Magic items, unique items, currency items and a crafting system that allows you to reroll items. Endless replayability with our Unleash system where any area can become maximum level. Randomly generated areas and monsters. No PvP outside a designate area. Everyone works together. Spellwake was made by a pair of independent programmers without a 3D artist. We hope that the gameplay is a lot of fun nevertheless.
